QuestData.Title: A Flare for the Dramatic
QuestData.Description:
I received a strange object with a note attached. Here, it seems to be written in your tongue, commander.
<Dear Mister Durotan,
I'm Penny... you know, from Azeroth? We met briefly back at $p's garrison.
Anyway, like I told you, I have a fifth degree black hammer in engineering and I'm eager to serve. The more danger the better!
You just fire this old flare whenever you're in trouble and I'll be there, quick as a quark!
Hopefully,
Penny>
QuestData.LogDescription: Shoot Penny's Flare Gun while in Deadgrin.
QuestData.RewardText: That didn't seem to do much, commander, except to give away our position to every creature in Gorgrond.$b$bWait, did you hear something?
